overview: Youth culture rules, except when it comes to sex. That's counterintuitive, but anyone that's been around the block a couple of times knows the truth: Young girls get all the talk, but MILFs get all the action. That's because most women don't even approach their prime until they've learned about their bodies, developed their sexuality and outgrown the inhibitions instilled by scared parents, jealous peers and a busybody society. Brazen, sexually indomitable beauties wear their "MILF Attitude" like lewd lingerie and come-fuck-me pumps in this compilation of stellar, recent debauches.
title: MILF Attitude
